raw: * Module for querying information about the environment / runtime.
* It adds a static key env to qxWeb and offers the given methods.
* The following values are predefined:
* * browser.name : The name of the browser
* * browser.version : The version of the browser
* * browser.quirksmode : true if the browser is in quirksmode
* * browser.documentmode : The document mode of the browser
* * device.name : The name of the device e.g. iPad.
* * device.type : Either desktop, tablet or mobile.
* * engine.name : The name of the browser engine
* * engine.version : The version of the browser engine
* * event.touch : Checks if touch events are supported
* * event.mspointer : Checks if MSPointer events are available
* @group (Core)

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Module for querying information about the environment / runtime. It adds a static key env to qxWeb and offers the given methods. The following values are predefined:

  • browser.name : The name of the browser
  • browser.version : The version of the browser
  • browser.quirksmode : true if the browser is in quirksmode
  • browser.documentmode : The document mode of the browser
  • device.name : The name of the device e.g. iPad.
  • device.type : Either desktop, tablet or mobile.
  • engine.name : The name of the browser engine
  • engine.version : The version of the browser engine
  • event.touch : Checks if touch events are supported
  • event.mspointer : Checks if MSPointer events are available

raw: * Get the value stored for the given key.
* @attachStatic {qxWeb, env.get}
* @param key {String} The key to check for.
* @return {var} The value stored for the given key.
* @lint environmentNonLiteralKey(key)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the value stored for the given key.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: key {String} The key to check for.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {var} The value stored for the given key.
@return.description: The value stored for the given key.

raw: * Adds a new environment setting which can be queried via {@link #get}.
* @param key {String} The key to store the value for.
* @attachStatic {qxWeb, env.add}
* @param value {var} The value to store.
* @return {qxWeb} The collection for chaining.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds a new environment setting which can be queried via {@link #get}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: key {String} The key to store the value for.
@param.description: The key to store the value for.
